beats.backtext: ▓▓▓▓▓ PAGE 14 ▓▓▓▓|$avatar_name is grunting and twisting, frustrated.’.

beats.text: ‘‘Aha! Another page… but wait! It’s back; the itch! Right there... right between the shoulders. It feels like a family of red ants is building a nest in my fur.’ (Beat) ‘I can't reach it. Help me, Little man-cub. Push!’

‘Ohhh... yes. Yes! Lower. A little to the left. Harder! Don't be shy, put your back into it!’ |VS| whispered $avatar_name, |VS| ‘That’s it! Grind that itch into dust. This is what the jagged edges of the world are for.’

‘Gone. I am a new bear. I feel light as a feather.’ |VS| said $avatar_name in relief, shaking their body out. |VS| ‘Thank you. Now, while I'm still in a good mood... let's see what the winds have brought us. Let's go.’
